text: Approval for an update to the indications for use to include pacing at the bundle of His. The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name SelectSecure MRI SureScan Lead Model 3830 and is indicated for:  The Model 3830 lead is intended for pacing and sensing in the atrium or right ventricle. It is also intended for pacing and sensing at the bundle of His as an alternative to right ventricular pacing in a single or dual chamber pacing system.
